Title: Hydraulic
InsufficientLight: Too dark. Try moving to a well-lit area.
InsufficientFeatures: Aim device at a surface with more texture or color.
PointTo: Point your camera to where you want to place an object.
MoreHelpText:
In order to start the experience, the app needs to detect a flat, horizontal surface.

Finding a surface works best on well-lit, textured surfaces like wood, concrete, tiles, and carpets.

Aim down at the floor or a tabletop, and move your phone slowly in a circle.

Make sure the lighting isnt too dark or too bright.
